iana.template_text:
Type name: application

Subtype name: mud+json

Required parameters: N/A

Optional parameters: N/A

Encoding considerations: 8bit; "application/mud+json" values are
represented as JSON objects; UTF-8 encoding MUST be employed
[RFC3629].

Security considerations: See Security Considerations of RFC 8520
and Section 12 of [RFC8259].

Interoperability considerations: N/A

Published specification: RFC 8520

Applications that use this media type: MUD managers as specified
by RFC 8520.
